name: Ascendia (ex AirDAO)
description: AirDAO is a decentralized autonomous organization governing the Ambrosus blockchain and its network of dApps. As the first DAO to encompass an entire L1 blockchain ecosystem, AirDAO is building an integrated suite of digital products and services that strip away the needless complexity from Web3 and bring its benefits to the average consumer via a single, easy-to-use web interface.
